page.title: 01Springfield and Boreham
page.content: Our survey area is one of contrasts, featuring a mixture of agricultural land and residential areas as represented by the older properties with character found in{Boreham} village and the new and modern complexes in{North Springfield}and {Chelmer Village}.The main A12 road cuts it in half and where it is a single carriage way, is a source of great congestion. A by-pass, now under construction and due for completion in 1986, will isolate Boreham. Many residents commute into London using{British Rail.}New light industries are providing some local work.The{Essex Police Headquarters}is the nerve centre for County Police operations, in-service training and vehicle maintainance.The{Chelmer and {Blackwater canal}was once an important trade link with the coast at Maldon.
